name: Onix
tagline: Delivering World Class Solution and Services
description:
Onix is a top Google Cloud Premier Partner that resells the entire Google Cloud portfolio coupled with world-class professional services including lift and shift, application development and dev ops. Onix consultants empower organizations to leverage the cloud to spark collaboration, innovation and transformation. Onix also develops custom products and applications.  
 
Onix has been working with clients in the corporate, education, federal, state and local government markets since 1992. We have been successful by evaluating our customers’ pain points and providing them with the best technology solutions to help them move their businesses forward. Our projects and capabilities are geographically dispersed, supporting customers worldwide.
 
Recent Awards:
2016
Google Cloud North American Partner Award for G Suite Customer Success
2015
Google North America Partner of the Year - G Suite
2013
Google Global Partner of the Year - Enterprise Search
Google North American Partner of the Year - Enterprise Search
